title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 591.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 591.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations

This Part establishes standards for the reimbursement of
comprehensive psychiatric emergency programs under the Medical Assistance

Program. Comprehensive psychiatric emergency programs must comply with the
requirements of Part 590 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
591.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 19, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 20, eff. 5/5/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
